name: Cheese Thief
overview: Cheese Thief is a simple shoot 'em up aimed at kids. The goal of the game is to use the number keys on the keyboard to move the player's tank left and right as well as firing your cannon to kill the mice before it takes the cheese and brings it back to his "mouse hole". You have five "lives" or cheeses altogether. This was developed by Mark Adams and Stephen Smith and published in Sinclair Programs - type-in from magazine issue #25 - 1984/Nov.
